text: Sketching floor plans doodles during long calls – zoning out into blueprint mode when there's downtime! Seems like whatever we do for work sneaks into those daily moments.
Seen charges for "energizing crystals" during site clearings—modern mystique meets urban planning!
Definitely - build your life at your pace!
Deep roots withstand more storms than flashy blooms do.
Like buildings need solid foundations, so do marriages—experience talking here.
Longevity's built-in shared coffees over crazy fireworks!
